Our offices have kitchen areas equipped with refrigerators, microwave ovens, as well as the necessary accessories for eating, water coolers, automatic coffee machines, shower rooms and safe bike parking lots, libraries.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each office has its own recreation areas where you can find kicker, darts, horizontal bars, game consoles, tables for air hockey or billiards.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a sports benefit, you can attend free corporate gyms located on Zhukova, 29, Kuprevicha, 1/1, Titazhnaya, 150 and Pritytskogo, 27a.
